uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

radius_server_id.description: The unique ID of the RADIUS Profile.

auth_round_trip_time.description: Time interval between most recent access reply and access-request. These values are calculated at runtime

auth_pend_req.description: Number of access request destined to server which are not yet timedout or not yet received response. These values are calculated at runtime.

auth_retransmits.description: Number of RADIUS Access-Request retransmitted to this server. These values are calculated at runtime.

auth_timeouts.description: The number of authentication timeouts to the server. These values are calculated at runtime.

auth_malform_resp.description: Number of malformed response received from the server. These values are calculated at runtime.

auth_bad_authen.description: Number of RADIUS Access-Response contains invalid Signature attributes. These values are calculated at runtime.

auth_unknown_type.description: Number of RADIUS packets of unknown type received on authentication port. These values are calculated at runtime.

auth_pkts_dropped.description: Number of RADIUS packets dropped. These values are calculated at runtime.

auth_access_req.description: Number of RADIUS Access-Request sent to the server. These values are calculated at runtime.

auth_access_challenge.description: Number of RADIUS Access-challenges received from the server. These values are calculated at runtime.

auth_access_accept.description: Number of RADIUS Access-accept received from the server. These values are calculated at runtime.

auth_access_reject.description: Number of RADIUS Access-reject received from the server. These values are calculated at runtime.

acct_round_trip_time.description: Time interval between most recent accounting response and accounting request. These values are calculated at runtime.

acct_pend_req.description: Number of accounting request destined to server which are not yet timedout or not yet received response. These values are calculated at runtime.

acct_retransmits.description: Number of RADIUS Accounting-Request retransmitted to this server. These values are calculated at runtime.

acct_timeouts.description: The number of accounting timeouts to the server. These values are calculated at runtime.

acct_malform_resp.description: Number of malformed response received from the server. These values are calculated at runtime.

acct_bad_authen.description: Number of RADIUS Accounting-Response contains invalid Signature attributes. These values are calculated at runtime.

acct_unknown_type.description: Number of RADIUS packets of unknown type received on accounting port. These values are calculated at runtime.

acct_pkts_dropped.description: Number of RADIUS packets dropped. These values are calculated at runtime.

acct_req.description: Number of RADIUS Accounting-Request sent to the server. These values are calculated at runtime.

acct_resp.description: Number of RADIUS Accounting-Response received from the server. These values are calculated at runtime.
